forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night carries a gentle whisper of coolness, the temperature hovering around 47 degrees. As the west northwest wind softly dances through the streets at just a whisper of speed, the sky reveals itself in a partly cloudy embrace, hinting at the celestial beauty awaiting the new day. The dawn promises a transition toward a clarity that will eventually unveil a mostly sunny Friday, where the warmth may peak near 60 degrees, followed by a gentle retreat to the mid-fifties come afternoon.

As the city awakens, though the fog may still linger in the early hours, it will gradually part to reveal the iconic panorama of the Golden Gate Bridge, standing graceful against an azure backdrop. The day invites a subtle sartorial choice—a light jacket to ward off the lingering chill of the morning, perhaps layered over a comfortable shirt, creating the perfect balance of warmth and ease. For those seeking to seize the day, now is the moment to explore the unsung nooks of the city: a stroll along the Embarcadero, coffee from a favorite cafe, or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the numerous parks where the blossoms gently nod in the fresh breeze.
